lyrics.stanza: Now from my heart comes, A happy song; It's just for You, Lord, There's only One: J-E-S-U-S, I love You.
How I long to sing With my spirit and heart to You. Jesus, You're so rich; In who You are and what You do. Ev'ry time I turn and open up, I drink of You. 'Cause I love You.
I've seen how they, Pierced Your side, You gave Your all, To win Your bride J-E-S-U-S, I love You.
Without Your love, Lord, I'm so empty Life has no meaning; Just vanity, J-E-S-U-S, Reality.
Jesus in me. What a wonder; Bubbling over, Living water. J-E-S-U-S, What a joy!
